SELECT SEQ_BOARD.nextVal FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(BOARD_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID) VALUES(#{boardId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, U.LOGIN_ID, U.USER_ID FROM TBL_BOARD B JOIN TBL_USER U ON B.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND B.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
SELECT BOARD_ID, TITLE, U.LOGIN_ID FROM TBL_BOARD B JOIN TBL_USER U ON B.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC

SELECT BOARD_ID, TITLE, LOGIN_ID, FILE_ID, NAME, UPLOAD_PATH, UUID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BOARD_ID, TITLE, LOGIN_ID, FILE_ID, NAME, UPLOAD_PATH, UUID FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_ID, TITLE, U.LOGIN_ID, F.FILE_ID, F.NAME, F.UPLOAD_PATH, F.UUID FROM TBL_BOARD B JOIN TBL_USER U ON B.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FILE_ID, NAME, UPLOAD_PATH, UUID, BOARD_ID FROM ( SELECT FILE_ID, NAME, UPLOAD_PATH, UUID, BOARD_ID, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY BOARD_ID ORDER BY FILE_ID) RK FROM TBL_FILE ) WHERE RK = 1 ) F ON B.BOARD_ID = F.BOARD_ID ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}
